feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Choose Azure AI image and video processing technology
entry.summary: Learn about vision capabilities of Azure AI services. Learn which service to use for a specific use cases.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI speech recognition and generation technology
entry.summary: Learn about Azure AI speech recognition and generation capabilities such as speech-to-text, and speech translation, and text-to-speech capabilities.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI targeted language processing technology
entry.summary: Learn about targeted language of Azure AI services. Learn which service to use for a specific use case.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI services technology
entry.summary: Learn about Azure AI services that you can use in AI applications and data flows. Choose the appropriate service for your use case.

entry.title: Generative AI ops for organizations with existing MLOps investments
entry.summary: Guidance to workload teams that have existing MLOps investments and are interested in extending those investments to include generative AI in their workload.

entry.title: Basic OpenAI end-to-end chat reference architecture
entry.summary: Establish foundational knowledge and experience for building and deploying enterprise chat applications with Azure OpenAI, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Secure research environment for regulated data
entry.summary: Architecture on Azure that shows a regulated environment for researchers to access sensitive data while providing a higher level of control and data protection.

entry.title: Provide custom authentication to Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway
entry.summary: Learn how to implement alternative authentication mechanisms for client applications that communicate with Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway.

entry.title: Modern data warehouses for small and medium-sized businesses
entry.summary: Learn how to use Microsoft Fabric, Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance, and Data Lake Storage to modernize SMB legacy and on-premises data.

entry.title: Implement logging and monitoring for Azure OpenAI language models
entry.summary: Implement comprehensive logging and monitoring and enhanced security for Azure OpenAI Service language models.

entry.title: Baseline OpenAI end-to-end chat reference architecture
entry.summary: A baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant enterprise chat applications with Azure OpenAI, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Chunking phase
entry.summary: Learn about the various chunking strategies like boundary based, custom code, and document analysis models. Also learn about how the document structure should influence your chunking strategy.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - LLM end to end evaluation phase
entry.summary: Learn about evaluating your RAG solution from end to end using key LLM and similarity metrics.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Preparation phase
entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when gathering test documents and queries. You use these artifacts to test and validate your chunking, information retrieval, and prompt engineering strategies.

entry.title: Video ingestion and object detection on the edge and in the cloud
entry.summary: Learn how to use a mobile robot with a live streaming camera and object detection to implement various use cases.

entry.title: Application platform considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without additional dependencies to other company resources - App Platform.

entry.title: Use Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with a multitenant Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with your Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster to expose microservice-based applications to the internet.

entry.title: Enterprise business intelligence
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a pipeline that moves data from an on-premises data warehouse into Azure Synapse and transforms the data for analysis.

entry.title: Optimize inventory and forecast demand with Power Platform and Azure
entry.summary: Optimize inventory and forecast demand by using Azure Machine Learning, Ray, and Power BI. Enable users to configure and run simulations in Power BI.

entry.title: Deploy IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to run IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure. See guidance for designing and implementing cloud solutions with MAS 8.5 and up that use Azure.

entry.title: Securely managed web applications
entry.summary: Learn about deploying secure applications using the Azure App Service Environment, the Azure Application Gateway service, and Web Application Firewall.

entry.title: Line-of-business application using Azure App Service Environment v3
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy line-of-business applications with an internal App Service Environment v3, while considering networking boundaries, DevOps, management, and more.

entry.title: Build the second layer of defense with Microsoft Defender XDR Solutions
entry.summary: Add additional security to your IT environment by using Microsoft 365 security service in addition to Azure security. This article is part of a series.

entry.title: Microsoft Sentinel automated responses
entry.summary: Use Microsoft Sentinel playbooks to generate automated responses and deliver intelligent security analytics for enterprises.

entry.title: Integrate Azure and Microsoft Defender XDR security services
entry.summary: Integrate security solutions from Azure and Microsoft 365 to create robust security for your hybrid and cloud IT environments. This article is part of a series.

entry.title: Use Microsoft Sentinel to integrate with Microsoft XDR security components
entry.summary: Integrate Azure monitoring services and Azure security services to provide defense in depth to your IT environment. This article introduces a series of articles.

entry.title: Map threats to your IT environment
entry.summary: Diagram the IT environment of your organization and develop a threat map to plan and build your defensive layer of security. This article is the second in a part of a series.

entry.title: Azure Files accessed from on-premises and secured by AD DS in a private network
entry.summary: Learn how to provide secure Azure Files that are secured by on-premises Windows Server Active Directory domain services (AD DS), and accessed on-premises.

entry.title: AKS (Kubernetes) day-2 operations guide
entry.summary: Learn about Azure Kubernetes Services (AKS) day-2 operations, such as triage, patching, upgrading, and troubleshooting.

entry.title: Stream processing with Databricks
entry.summary: Learn how to create a four stage end-to-end stream processing pipeline in Azure using Azure Databricks.

entry.title: Manage Microsoft 365 tenant configuration with Azure DevOps
entry.summary: Learn how to manage Microsoft 365 tenant configuration by using Microsoft365DSC and Azure DevOps.

entry.title: Azure service retry guidance
entry.summary: Learn about the retry mechanism features for many Azure services. Retry mechanisms differ because services have different characteristics and requirements.

entry.title: Gridwich operations for Azure Storage
entry.summary: Learn about the characteristics of the Gridwich Azure Storage Service.

entry.title: Azure App Configuration considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure App Configuration that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Azure Key Vault considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Key Vault that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance for how to use Azure Key Vault in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: BCDR for Azure Data Factory and Azure Synapse Analytics pipelines
entry.summary: See automated and user-managed methods to achieve business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) for Data Factory and Azure Synapse pipelines.

entry.summary: Learn how to secure a data lakehouse that's implemented by using Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.title: Enable real-time sync of MongoDB Atlas data changes to Azure Synapse Analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to keep Azure Synapse Analytics data pools synchronized with operational data changes in MongoDB Atlas.

entry.summary: Conceptualize, architect, build, and deploy an application that uses projects from the CNCF after deployment of AKS.

entry.summary: Run Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster in multiple regions to achieve high availability.

entry.title: Real-time anomaly detection for conveyor belts
entry.summary: View a reference architecture that describes how to enable real-time anomaly detection for conveyor belts.

entry.title: Risk prediction models for surgeries
entry.summary: Enable a risk stratification model for surgeries.

entry.title: Scale AI and machine learning initiatives in regulated industries
entry.summary: Learn about scaling Azure AI and machine learning environments that must comply with extensive security policies.

entry.title: Use Azure Front Door to secure AKS workloads
entry.summary: Learn how to secure AKS workloads by using end-to-end TLS encryption, Azure Front Door Premium, an Azure Private Link service, and the NGINX ingress controller.

entry.summary: Use AI Builder and Azure Form Recognizer in a Power Automate workflow to extract text from images, for indexing and retrieval.

entry.summary: Create a pipeline for ingesting and analyzing RSS news feed data using Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Cognitive Services, and other Azure services.

entry.summary: Compare options for real-time message stream processing in Azure, with key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.summary: This article describes approaches to support multitenancy for the artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) components of your solution.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) baseline architecture for AKS on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement a baseline architecture for Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) running on Azure Stack HCI.

entry.title: Multiparty computing architecture design
entry.summary: Learn about Azure services that can help you build a multiparty computing solution, which can include cloud-based and on-premises resources.

entry.title: Analyze observational patient data by using OHDSI with the OMOP CDM
entry.summary: Deploy and operate a solution that uses OHDSI and the OMOP CDM to analyze observational patient data.

entry.title: Use AI enrichment with image and text processing
entry.summary: Learn how to transform unstructured image and text data into full-text searchable content with Azure AI Search prebuilt skills and custom skills.

entry.title: Use Azure Front Door to secure AKS workloads
entry.summary: Learn how to secure AKS workloads by using end-to-end TLS encryption, Azure Front Door Premium, an Azure Private Link service, and the NGINX ingress controller.

entry.title: Provide custom authentication to Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway
entry.summary: Learn how to implement alternative authentication mechanisms for client applications that communicate with Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway.

entry.title: Use Azure Red Hat OpenShift in the financial services industry
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Red Hat OpenShift landing zone to create secure, resilient, and compliant solutions in a hybrid cloud environment.

entry.title: Use Azure NetApp Files to deploy IBM Power in Skytap on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy IBM Power workloads in Skytap on Azure by using Azure NetApp Files for file storage and other Microsoft Azure components.

entry.title: Use Azure OpenAI to process podcast audio files
entry.summary: Learn how to create a podcast synopsis and localize it into multiple languages using AI and the required infrastructure to automate the required processes.

entry.title: Load-balancing options
entry.summary: Learn about Azure load-balancing services and considerations to select one for distributing traffic across multiple computing resources.

entry.title: Run a Capture the Flag game service with CTFd on Azure PaaS
entry.summary: Build a CTFd service with Azure platform as a service (PaaS) so that you can manage your games while Azure takes care of the infrastructure.

entry.title: Azure Resource Manager considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Resource Manager that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples for how to use Azure Resource Manager in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Tenancy models for a multitenant solution
entry.summary: Learn about various multitenancy models and about how to choose the best one for your scenario.

entry.title: Artificial intelligence (AI) architecture
entry.summary: Get started with artificial intelligence (AI). Use high-level architectural types, see Azure AI platform offerings, and find customer success stories.

entry.title: Implement logging and monitoring for Azure OpenAI language models
entry.summary: Implement comprehensive logging and monitoring and enhanced security for Azure OpenAI Service language models.

entry.title: Build and deploy custom document processing models on Azure
entry.summary: See Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

entry.title: Esri ArcGIS Platform on Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: View a reference architecture that shows how to deploy ArcGIS Pro in Azure Virtual Desktop to support the hyperscale of Azure.

entry.title: Kubernetes monitoring and logging
entry.summary: Understand monitoring and logging for an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster and workloads, and compare Amazon EKS and AKS monitoring and logging.

entry.title: Cost management for Kubernetes
entry.summary: Understand Kubernetes cluster and workload costs, see how to optimize and govern costs, and compare Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and Amazon EKS options.

entry.title: AKS for Amazon EKS professionals
entry.summary: Read about the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) managed solution, configurations, best practices, and similarities and differences with Amazon EKS.

entry.title: Storage options for a Kubernetes cluster
entry.summary: Understand storage options for a Kubernetes cluster, and compare Amazon EKS and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) storage options.

entry.title: Video ingestion and object detection on the edge and in the cloud
entry.summary: Learn how to use a mobile robot with a live streaming camera and object detection to implement various use cases.

entry.title: Pipes and Filters pattern
entry.summary: Break down a task that performs complex processing into a series of separate elements that can be reused or reordered.

entry.title: Personalized offers
entry.summary: Build intelligent marketing systems that provide customer-tailored content by using machine learning models that analyze data from multiple sources.

entry.title: Application design considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a mission-critical workload that users access over a public endpoint without extra dependencies to other company resources.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) baseline architecture for AKS on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement a baseline architecture for Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) running on Azure Stack HCI.

entry.title: Deploy and operate apps with AKS enabled by Arc on Azure Stack HCI or Windows Server
entry.summary: Build an app deployment pipeline for containerized apps on AKS enabled by Arc that are running on Azure Stack HCI or Windows Server.

entry.title: Google Cloud to Azure services comparison
entry.summary: Compare Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure services. Not every Google Cloud service or Azure service is listed, and not every matched service has exact feature parity.

entry.title: N-tier architecture style
entry.summary: Know the benefits, challenges, and best practices for N-tier architectures on Azure. An N-tier architecture splits an app into logical layers and physical tiers.

entry.title: Automate document processing with AI Document Intelligence
entry.summary: Build an automated document processing pipeline. Use AI Document Intelligence to extract data and natural language processing models to enrich the data.

entry.title: Refactor mainframe computer systems that run Adabas & Natural
entry.summary: Learn how to modernize mainframe computer systems that run Adabas & Natural and move them to the cloud.

entry.title: Run Apache Cassandra on Azure VMs
entry.summary: Examine performance considerations for running Apache Cassandra on Azure Virtual Machines. Use these recommendations as a baseline to test against your workload.

entry.title: Data scrambling for SAP applications using Delphix and Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Analytics
entry.summary: Learn about how to perform data scrambling for SAP applications using Delphix and Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.title: Starter web app for SaaS development
entry.summary: A starting point for building software as a service (SaaS) on Azure. This architecture includes common SaaS components such as identity, onboarding, and tenant management.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) network architecture for AKS on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement network concepts for deploying Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) nodes on AKS clusters.

entry.title: Run HP-UX workloads in Azure with Stromasys Charon-PAR
entry.summary: Learn how to use a lift-and-shift approach to migrate an HP-UX workload to Azure. The architecture uses Charon-PAR emulator software.

entry.title: Migrate mainframe data to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use RDRS, a mainframe data replication solution, to migrate data to and from multiple Azure data platform services.

entry.title: Windows 365 Azure network connection
entry.summary: Learn how Windows 365 delivers highly optimized and personalized computing instances that are purpose built for each user's requirements.

entry.title: Implement an open-source jump server solution on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to create a jump server on Azure by using Apache Guacamole, an open-source tool that provides functionality similar to that of Azure Bastion.

entry.title: Create an Autonomous Vehicle Operations (AVOps) solution
entry.summary: Learn about an architecture that you can use to build automated driving solution by using Azure services.

entry.title: Deploy AKS and API Management with mTLS
entry.summary: Learn how to integrate Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and Azure API Management with mutual TLS in an architecture that provides end-to-end encryption.

entry.title: Cloud design patterns
entry.summary: Learn about design patterns for building reliable, scalable, secure applications in the cloud by walking through examples based on Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Design and implementation patterns
entry.summary: Use these design and implementation patterns to simplify administration, development, and reusability for your cloud application.

entry.title: Orchestrate MLOps by using Azure Databricks
entry.summary: Learn about an approach to machine learning operations (MLOps) that uses Azure Databricks to run model training and batch scoring.

entry.title: Access Azure OpenAI and other language models through a gateway
entry.summary: Learn about the challenges of directly accessing Azure OpenAI or other language models and how injecting a gateway lets you augment model usage with extra capabilities.

entry.title: Use a gateway in front of multiple Azure OpenAI deployments or instances
entry.summary: Learn how to add a gateway in front of multiple Azure OpenAI model deployments or instances.

entry.title: Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture in an Azure landing zone
entry.summary: Learn how to build on the Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture to address changes and expectations when you deploy it in an Azure landing zone.

entry.title: Baseline OpenAI end-to-end chat reference architecture
entry.summary: A baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant enterprise chat applications with Azure OpenAI, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Multilayered protection for Azure virtual machines
entry.summary: Protect access to Azure VMs through a multilayer approach, using Azure and Entra ID security services. These recommendations align with security principles and best practices, such as defense in depth, least privilege, and zero trust.

entry.title: Integrate Teradata VantageCloud Enterprise with Azure Data Factory
entry.summary: Learn how to use Teradata VantageCloud Enterprise together with Azure Data Factory to develop data integration pipelines.

entry.title: Model loan credit risk and default probability
entry.summary: Use Azure Machine Learning, Azure Synapse Analytics, App Service, and Power BI to model loan credit risk and default probability.

entry.title: Azure Synapse Analytics for landing zones
entry.summary: Prepare Azure landing zone subscriptions for a scalable, enhanced-security deployment of Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.title: Multiregion BCDR for Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: Learn which options and scenarios are possible to design and implement an effective multi-region BCDR strategy for Azure Virtual Desktop.

entry.title: IBM z/OS mainframe migration with Avanade AMT
entry.summary: See how to use the Avanade Automated Migration Technology (AMT) framework to migrate IBM z/OS mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.title: Refactor mainframe architecture by using CloudFrame Renovate
entry.summary: Refactor your mainframe architecture to Azure by using the CloudFrame Renovate code migration tool. Renovate migrates COBOL to Java.

entry.title: Modernize mainframe workloads by using Model9
entry.summary: Use Model9 Manager to send mainframe data directly to Azure Blob Storage as part of a mainframe modernization migration.

entry.title: Replicate mainframe data by using Precisely Connect
entry.summary: Learn how to use Precisely Connect to migrate legacy mainframe and midrange systems to the Azure platform.

entry.title: Move archive data from mainframe systems to Azure
entry.summary: Learn about a reference architecture that shows how to move data from mainframe and midrange systems to Azure.

entry.title: Build real-time monitoring and observable systems for media
entry.summary: Learn how to implement real-time monitoring and observability of systems and end-user device telemetry data.

entry.title: Enable machine learning inference on an Azure IoT Edge device
entry.summary: Enable machine learning inference on an IoT Edge device. Scenarios include image classification, object detection, and body, face, and gesture analysis.

entry.title: Global routing redundancy for mission-critical web applications
entry.summary: Learn how to develop highly resilient global web applications.

entry.title: Solutions for the energy and environment industries
entry.summary: Architectures and ideas for using Azure services to build efficient, scalable, and reliable solutions in the energy and environment industries.

entry.title: Azure landing zones - Terraform module design considerations
entry.summary: Design considerations for the Azure landing zones Terraform module.

entry.title: Virtual WAN architecture optimized for department-specific requirements
entry.summary: Learn how to design a single network that has varying security and performance requirements.

entry.title: Improved-security access to multitenant web apps from an on-premises network
entry.summary: Set up improved-security private connectivity to a multitenant web app or function app from an on-premises network or from within an Azure virtual network.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Information retrieval phase
entry.summary: Learn about key decision points when you're configuring a search index. Learn about the various types of search you can perform such as vector, full text, hybrid, and hybrid manual. Finally, learn about breaking queries into subqueries, and why and how to rerank queries.

entry.title: Guide to designing and developing a RAG solution
entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when designing an LLM RAG solution, including determining what test documents and queries to use during evaluation, choosing a chunking strategy, determining what and how you should enrich the chunks, choosing the right embedding model, how to configure the search index, determining what searches you want to perform, and how to evaluate each step.
